attributes.review: I opened this and I swear my phone instantly shut down. I had to go into Apple to get the app manually deleted because my phone refused to come back on. If I could leave a 0 star review I would. Side note I also think the app is cursed. The same day I got it my granny, my fish, and my dad died. The power went out. My house burned down. Nothing good comes from this app !!!
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: 100,000% sure that it did. Once I downloaded it I was starting to feel a little weird but I didn’t really think about it that much but then when the first screen popped up of this horrid app... I knew. My eyes found that wrinkly fist and face and I could just feel the herpes. So if you don’t wanna get herpes I recommend not getting this app.
attributes.title: I’m pretty sure this app gave me herpes...

attributes.review: So I just downloaded this app and the first thing i saw was the hot cheeto man. I thought that I downloaded the new Trump 2020 app to support our non racist, misogynistic, and homophobic president but unfortunately I have come to the conclusion that this wonderful and beautiful app is hacked. I am truly sorry to whoever created the app dealing with the hardships of being under attack and I hope it all stops soon.
attributes.title: just no. ❤️

attributes.review:
I’d like to start off by saying I had never EVER downloaded the most horrible app until now 
I am very dissatisfied by my decision to download this app and I do NOT encourage other people to download it let alone let it be allowed to be an app on here 
I believe it should be taken down immediately 
I will never be downloading this app again any time soon
attributes.title: The most horrible app

attributes.review: i originally downloaded this as a way to keep up with donnie boy himself, but this app is actually atrocious. i suggest that apple takes this disgusting excuse for an app off the app store, as it is simply a waste of space. not only does it look like a child designed it, it also made my phone crash. attributes.review: Horrible it can hack your phone 📱!!! I saw my FBI agent face because when they hacked it it probably took it from the fbi. My FBI agent as bald 👨‍🦲 and he was running 🏃‍♀️ on a the roof! She was crazy 😜. But when I’m FBI agent got exposed I showed my dog 🐱 and my dogs phone revealed her FBI agent. And she was a man 👨. Life crazy when you see your FBI agent! But other then that the App lags too MUcH!!!!!!!!!!! And not worth it 💅.
attributes.title: Not worth it also disappointing 🤭

attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately felt nauseous. I’m not one to shame, but seeing Donald Trump was not it. My entire breakfast came back up and I had to force myself to not throw up. For the rest of the day I had the worst heart burn ever. Not to mention seeing all of the events he had planned added to my anxiety, so much so I chewed a finger off. Do yourself a favor and delete this app.
attributes.title: Downloading this app is a health risk
